name: The Cackler In The Haze
description:
The Cackler In The Haze is a short 3D first-person horror game where you wake up and find yourself in an unknown building, later on, you'll hear strange laughter to realize that you're not alone so you will try to escape the building and hopefully not meet with the laughter source.

Controls are:

CommandsKeyboard/MouseXbox ControllerPS4 (DS4 Windows)MovementWASD/ArrowsL AnalogL AnalogRunL ShiftRBR1CrouchCXSquareInteractLeft MouseACrossUse FlashlightFYTriangleView MapTABR3R3Look At (CN)NoneLBL1PauseEscStartOptions

Bonus: The game has two endings, if you finish them both you will unlock extra content in the main menu.

**Please if you encounter any bug, let me know in the comments**
